page.title: 03TRADE IN TICKHILL
page.content: Although quite small,Tickhill has a wide selection of{shops}including two supermarkets,two butchers,a greengrocers,a newsagents,a chemist, two off-licences,a fish and chip shop,a bakers which bakes its own goods on the premises and a variety of small grocers.The most popular food store is Taylors.In a survey we conducted the customers said that it was convenient and although expensive offered a wide variety of goods and excellent service.Tickhill also has a florist,a print shop,an antique shop, a hardwear store,two banks,two estate agents,two building societies and three hairdressers.Tickhill is unusual in that it also boasts seven exclusive and expensive {clothing stores,}a top quality{restaurant,}a high class interior designers and a well established beauty salon.
